overview: Neon spores is a nahual film, totem and stone, broken mirror, seed, inscription.  Underground tunnels communicating ancient times and spaces. Between plateaus and memories of other seas and other moons elements of speculative fiction, imaginary archeologies and meticulous collection of sherds and other embedded materials. Excavation cinema, earth-moving cinema to invariably find the dead and incomplete stories.
tagline: A nahual film, totem and stone, broken mirror, seed, inscription
title: Neon Spores
